page.title: 07ONEHOUSE VILLAGE
page.content: Onehouse is a very happy village with a lot of community spirit.Everybody questioned,said that they enjoy living in the village.The peace and quiet of the country-side is liked by all.The village provides many activities,for young and old alike.There are plays performed by local villagers which are watched and enjoyed by all. Onehouse contains a great mixture of ages,many people have moved there recently and some have lived there for over forty years. On 7th June 1985 a widely used village shop was closed and everybody was disappointed.A few people had used it for things they had forgotten,but many used it for their regular shopping.There is also a bus service through Onehouse to the nearby village of Harleston,it turns round and then returns to Stowmarket.
